    Cloud Market Research

    How big is the cloud market region-wise, and how has it changed over time? Interactive visualization of regional market share since 2016.

    Machine Learning Playground was created by Mrityunjay Bhardwaj while going through several ML Books such as ESL, PRML,Goodfellow et al etc. The goal of this website is to make machine learning a bit more accessible through interactive visualizations (designed using Mike Bostock‚Äôs JavaScript library D3.js).
